name: ListApp Mobile Manager
author: InspireUI

sections.description: The plugin is used for config the ListApp mobile and support RestAPI to connect to the app.
sections.installation:
Manual Installation

  1. Upload the entire /listapp-manager directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate ‘ListApp Mobile Manager’ through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Better Installation

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New in your WordPress admin and search for ‘ListApp Mobile Manager’.
  2. Click Install.

short_description: The ListApp Settings and APIs for supporting the Listing Directory mobile app by React Native framework
description: The plugin is used for config the ListApp mobile and support RestAPI to connect to the app.
